name: The Bunk Mate (Mid-Week Demo)
description:
A horrid creature is plaguing you and your family with its sick and twisted games after your family was nearly torn apart from the disappearance of your elder brother three years ago. Survive the week as you try to protect your family and escape from it's terrible grasp.

"The Bunk Mate" is a week/night based horror game made almost completely with still images and controlling actions through the use of buttons. It includes a unique pixel art style and a hidden lore pertaining to the dark secrets behind the tragedy.

(This is the "Mid-Week" Demo and many things have not yet been implemented. Keep in mind that this does not represent the finished product)

Youtubers and streamers have full permission to film and stream.

Music by Jonathan Segev:

https://www.youtube.com/c/JonathanSegevMusic
